xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
############################################################################### # WikiManager Manager translation page # # The translations contained in this page are used in the default UI (see xwiki-platform-web), # that can be displayed in subwikis too. That is why the scope of this page is GLOBAL. # # This contains the translations of the module in the default language # (generally English). # # Translation key syntax: # <short top level project name>.<short module name>.<propertyName> # where: # * <short top level project name> = top level project name without the "xwiki-" prefix, # for example: commons, rendering, platform, enterprise, manager, etc # * <short module name> = the name of the Maven module without the <short top level project name> prefix, # for example: oldcore, scheduler, activitystream, etc # * <propertyName> = the name of the property using camel case, # for example updateJobClassCommitComment # # Comments: it's possible to add some detail about a key to make easier to # translate it by adding a comment before it. To make sure a comment is not # assigned to the following key use at least three sharps (###) for the comment # or after it. # # Deprecated keys: # * when deleting a key it should be moved to deprecated section at the end # of the file (between #@deprecatedstart and #@deprecatedend) and associated to the # first version in which it started to be deprecated # * when renaming a key, it should be moved to the same deprecated section # and a comment should be added with the following syntax: # #@deprecated new.key.name # old.key.name=Some translation ###############################################################################
## Menus ### Missing: platform.wiki.menu.wikiindex=Wiki Index ### Missing: platform.wiki.menu.deletewiki=Delete wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.menu.userwikis=Wikis
## Dependencies ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.wiki.missing=The "Wiki" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki API" and "Wiki Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.template.missing=The "Wiki Template" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki Template API" and "Wiki Template Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-template-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation). ### Missing: platform.wiki.dependencies.user.missing=The "Wiki User" java component is not installed. This page will not work properly. Make sure that the "Wiki User API" and "Wiki User Script" extensions are installed (using the Extension Manager) or that the files 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-api-<version>.jar' and 'xwiki-platform-wiki-user-script-<version>.jar' are present under the 'WEB-INF/lib/' web application's folder (in case of a manual installation).
## Create ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.button=Create Wiki platform.wiki.create.title=Creează un nou wiki platform.wiki.create.members=MEMBRI ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.prettyname.empty=Pretty name must not be empty ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.error=Wiki \"{0}\" creation failed: {1}. platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.databasealreadyexists=O bază de date cu acest identificator deja exista platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.wikialreadyexists=Acest identificator este deja folosit platform.wiki.create.error.wikiname.empty=Identificatorul nu poate fi gol
## Common errors and messages ### Missing: platform.wiki.error.wikidoesnotexist=Wiki [{0}] does not exist platform.wiki.error.oneParameterNotSpecified=Parametrul ''{0}'' nu a fost specificat platform.wiki.error.parameterAcceptsMultipleValues=Acceptă valori multiple platform.wiki.error.exceptionWithMessage=Exceptie\: {0} platform.wiki.form.requiredField=Obligatoriu ### Missing: platform.wiki.csrf.error=Invalid security token. Please retry your operation.
## Users ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.userAlreadyMemberOfWiki=The user {0}{1}{2} is already a member of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.userNotMemberOfWiki=The user {0}{1}{2} is not a member of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.logInToContinue=In order to continue, you need to {0}log in{1} first. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has accepted the invitation to join the wiki ''{2}'' ({3}). ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userAcceptedSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully accepted the invitation and joined the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.userRejectedSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully rejected the invitation to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.error.needInvitation=This wiki is invite only. To do so, you need to receive an invitation from one of its admins. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.pendingRequestExists=The user {0}{1}{2} already has a pending request to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. Please wait for a wiki admin to review it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelConfirmation=Are you sure you want cancel the request to join the wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelYes=Da platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelNo=Nu ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancelSuccess=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully cancelled the request to join the wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.saveNotification=The user ''{0}'' ({1}) has requested to join the wiki ''{2}'' ({3}). ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully sent the request to join wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.confirmation=Are you sure you want to join the wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.join.yes=Da platform.wiki.users.join.no=Nu ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully joined wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.error.userIsOwner=The user {0}{1}{2} is the owner of the wiki {3}{4}{5}. The owner of a wiki cannot leave it unless the wiki is deleted or the owner is changed. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation=Are you sure you want to leave wiki {0}{1}{2}? platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.yes=Da platform.wiki.users.leave.confirmation.no=Nu ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.leave.success=The user {0}{1}{2} successfully left wiki {3}{4}{5}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.title=Join Wiki platform.wiki.users.leave.title=Părăsește Wiki platform.wiki.users.leave.empty= platform.wiki.users.delete.title=Șterge Wiki "{0}" ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.delete.empty=Delete Wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.hint=A reply message to send, viewable by the wiki admin, in which you can motivate your decision. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.hint=To join the wiki {0}{1}{2}, you must first issue a join request. After doing so, a wiki admin will review and consider your request. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.hint=A message to send, viewable by the wiki admin, in which you can motivate this join request. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.title=You have been invited to join the wiki {0}{1}{2}. ### Missing: platform.wiki.users.invitation.message.label=Invitation message platform.wiki.users.invitation.reply.title=Răspunde platform.wiki.users.invitation.accept.label=Acceptă platform.wiki.users.invitation.reject.label=Respinge platform.wiki.users.invitation.postpone.label=Mai târziu platform.wiki.users.join.request.message.label=Mesaj platform.wiki.users.join.request.send.label=Trimite Cerere platform.wiki.users.join.request.cancel.label=Înapoi

## Wizard platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiname=Identificatorul unic al noului wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.wikialias=The domain name that will point to the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.newTemplateHint=Template to use for this new wiki (all pages will be cloned). ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.description=A brief description of the wiki and its purpose. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.owner=A user who will always have all the rights on this wiki, independent of the rights configured in the Administration. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.desc.members=The users who can participate in the wiki. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType=Pasul 1 -- Alege un nume platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.nameAndType.shortname=Nume ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users=Step 2 — Choose members ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.users.shortname=Users platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp=Curățare ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.provisioning.cleanUp=Clean & delete this wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.success=The wiki {0} has been successfuly deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningup.error=Error, the wiki {0} has not been deleted. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirmmessage=You are about to delete wiki {0}. Please confirm. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.cleaningUp.confirm=Confirmă ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.setAsTemplate.label=This wiki will be a template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.noTemplate=No template (default) ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.label=User Scope ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.userScope.hint=Select what kind of users can access the wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.template.label=Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.label=Flavor / Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.hint=Flavor or Template to use as the initial content of the new wiki ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.flavorTab=Flavor ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.flavortemplate.templateTab=Template ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.dw=After clicking on the "Create" button, the wiki will be created and the Distribution Wizard will be started in order to help you initialize your wiki. If you skip the wizard, your wiki will be empty. platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.previous=Pasul anterior platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.next=Pasul următor platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.create=Creează
### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation=Wiki creation ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.wait=Please wait until the wiki is created. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.complete=The wiki {0} has been successfully created. You can now access it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.errorlog=However, error(s) have been generated during that process and you might want to review them. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.error=The creation of the wiki {0} failed. It''s recommended to delete it. ### Missing: platform.wiki.create.wizard.step.creation.go=Go to the wiki
## Admin ### Missing: admin.wikis.description=Wikis management. ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates=Wiki Templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.description=Manage the wiki templates ### Missing: admin.wikis.templates.hint=A template is a wiki that will be considered as a model to create new wikis. When a user selects a template to create a new wiki, all the content of the template is copied in the new wiki. ### Missing: admin.wikis.rights=Creation Right
## XWikiServer Sheet ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title=Descriptor of the wiki \"{0}\" ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasalreadynotexists=Wiki alias \"{0}\" already exists. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.erroraliasdoesnotexists=Wiki alias \"{0}\" does not exists. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.settings=Wiki properties ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.createnewalias=Create new alias ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.title.viewaliases=View aliases ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.wikiprettyname=The display name of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.owner=A user who will have all the rights on this wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.secure=If enabled, all this wiki's generated externals URLs will start with \"https\". ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.port=The port to use for all this wiki's generated externals URLs. If not set it's inherited from the configuration and the main wiki. Only taken into account for domain based URLs. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.iswikitemplate=Indicate if this wiki can be used as a template when creating a new wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.server=The alias used to access the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.description=A brief wiki description. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.desc.homepage=The homepage of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.wikiprettyname=Pretty name platform.wiki.sheet.prop.owner=Posesor ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.secure=Secure (SSL) ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.port=Port platform.wiki.sheet.prop.description=Descriere ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.server=Alias platform.wiki.sheet.prop.homepage=Pagina de start ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.prop.iswikitemplate=Wiki template ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor=This page defines how to access the \"{0}\" wiki, and some properties about it. For more configurations, please go to the ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.descriptor.admin=administration page of the wiki. ### Missing: platform.wiki.sheet.aliases=An alias is another name for the wiki. You can add aliases to create different URLs for the wiki.
